quotes.quote: You’ve got to get up every morning with determination if you’re going to go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: George Lorimer

quotes.quote: Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you’ll be able to see further.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Your talent determines what you can do. Your motivation determines how much you’re willing to do. Your attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: The individual who says it is not possible should move out of the way of those doing it.
quotes.author: Tricia Cunningham

quotes.quote: I learned this, at least, by my experiment; that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When someone tells me ‘no,’ it doesn’t mean I can’t do it, it simply means I can’t do it with them.
quotes.author: Karen E. Quinones Miller

quotes.quote: Build your own dreams or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
quotes.author: Farrah Gray
